item.title: Securing Your Code With Amazon Q Developer üîç
item.description: Securing Your Code With Amazon Q Developer Introduction What is Amazon Q Developer? Amazon Q Developer is a generative artificial intelligence (AI) powered conversational assistant that can help us understand, build, extend, and operate AWS applications. We can ask questions about AWS architecture, our AWS resources, best practices, documentation, support, and more. Amazon Q is constantly updating its capabilities so our questions get the most contextually relevant and actionable answers. How Amazon Q Developer help us with secure coding?
